documents.document:
Home sweet home

Woot so this is my first bloggy thingy!
My first time on this ting so bare wid me yeah....
So its pretty kewl ive joined tons of these site but this one looks more interestin than the rest. Easy to use blah blah blah
Yup so if ya wanna know more den ya gotta leave a message ppz. Dont be shy im ever so friendly lol
Neways youll be hearin more from me woot!
Love Amy xxxx

hiii

Sooo tha last time i wrote on here was the 1st november 2006 ohh bless i was only 15 then lol those were the daayyys. Well loads has happened since then but not gonna bore maself and you pan.neters by putting it all down Am boooooooooored need somthing 2 doooo so just writing here as you can see! Ma last day off got school 2moro but only anotha week 2 go and am doing 4 lyf 3 months or sumthing soooooooooooooooooooooooooo happy hehe. Well not gonna write anymore if your as bored as I am then talk 2 meeeeee cos a gal needs summat 2 do lol
amy xXx

so bored yet so happy lol

Oh no its that time again...when i get bored and i just write a load of crap on here cos ive nowt beta to do with my tuesday nights looool.
Todays been rubbish just slept all day...seriously need a job or a hobby lol
And i miss my Sande haha see how he doesnt talk 2 me after i make him watch shit films at the cinema mwahahaha. Baby these are the things you have to do in a relationship...but yeah the film was a load of crap to put it nicely
Am happy tho...kinda....jst finished watchin big brother :O what bitches
ok yeh i know i need a life dont need to rub it in
gonna shut up now in case u all think am a total saddo with no social life and no good taste in films
mwahaha
bye for now

bored!!!!

am sooo bored i cud actually fall asleep while i'm typing this theres nothing to doooo
went to watch hancock a second time 2day...dont ask why cos am not that sure maself lol oh wel
ma new fone comes tomorow so am happy..only thing i gots to luk 4wad 2
duno why am writin this its pointless lol its just to kill sum tym cos i cant sleep
and ma hairs pissin me off.......got caught in the rain earlier now i look like this lmfao
gona try sleeep anyways wish me luk looolz

and its ciao 4 now
amyyyy x

it's that time again...

Yesss that time when amy gets bored and decided to bore all the pan.neters with my ranting and chatting about absolutely nothing
I know you all love it really
Has been a guuurd week...mostly sleeping eating time with the hubby and gettin tanned.
Yes i bet u didnt know black girls liked to get a suntan loool
its ma mummys birthday on Saturday
Do you know what that means?
paaaartaaaay
Time for sande to meet the family..... baby all i can say is good luck and from saturday night you will realise where i got my strangeness from
but yes shud be goood.
should be sleeping cos somebody's making me meet them at 10am tommorow *cough* SANDE *cough* but the heat is keeping me awake
Gonna stop talking now anyway
Nighty night!

is it that time already?!

OF COURSE IT IS!
it's time to bore you pan.neters time.

well i can't be the only one bored around here that wouldn't be very fair now would it?
am doing nothing at the moment...practically staring into space...just finished watchin lee evans wotta legend
speakin of legends....who knew bernie mac had died? wotta shame that guy was fuuuurnny
oh wel....
tomorrow doing nothin because the british weather told me so so totally sick of rain and my hair gettin all wet and afro-y even if i do look cool lol
so its daytime tv for me n mummykinz tomorrow...jeremy kyle...get in
wel sik of typing now...am hungry...cud murder a reggae reggae chicken sub...
if u havent tried one of dem things i suggest you all stop reading this and go buy one like now...
soo am off
cya nxt time pplz!

pooof! im here!

Hmmmph my eyes are stinnnggiiiiing with the tiredness. havent really slept this weekend. I feel my bed calling me.
But am waiting 4 ppz 2 get there backsides online so am here unfortunatley
Tis sunday night/monday morning. 1st of September
back 2 school sooon! Gona be a sixth former dnt know what to think on that matter.
Been an eventful weekend for reasons which cannot be displayed on my blog
Went to watch that new "scary" film the Strangers.! What a fucking total waste of fucking time! Sorry but had to be said..dont waste your time by going to watch it!
Had to get that off my chest.
Another film i will not admit to my friends i have watched
along with the whole prince caspian thing.

am bored of writing i dont even know if wot ive put makes sense. im shooo tired
byyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyye

i'm seventeen!

well i havent wrote on here for sooooooooooo long
guess what... it was ma birthday yesterday lol
i know you don't care....tbh i dont either i just like gettin closer to being 18

yesterday was interesting...... i would rather not tell you what i got up to yesterdat loool
but tomorrow should be a larff
off round town..gona b fun to see if ma mates are gonna b able to get in any clubs lol

annnd its ma anniversary 2moro.... 4 months who knew we'd make it so far am rather happy about it to be honest.... i feel one of them lovey dovey moments coming up....

but yeaah u guys dont wana hear that lol
am just boooored have got 3 essays 2 do but i don't think theyll get done to be honest. my heart just isnt into the sixth form thing anymore. i think i need a change of scenery...see wot BFD or shipley collage has to offfer... if anyone reading this goes 2 eitha of dese collages let me know wot its like lol
just waiting for ma mummykinz 2 get home so i can yam sum cake.... all she does is work lol.. i miss her wel i do until she starts talking then i'll be telling her to get her arse back to work lol jkin
I LUV MY MUMMY REALLY

bored of typing now... so go read another boring pointless blog mwhahaha

byyyyye for now
xXx

blog time

i'm booored...just waiting to get ma arse out the house

well this week has seen more shit than a public toilet...but hey am still smiling..sort of

gt up tooooo early....my neighbours hav decided to buy a baby alsatian that wnt stop yapping!
i swear theyre turnin that place into a fukkin farm
rabbits dogs pigeons?!
as if they werent noisy enuff
and thanks 2 the rabbits i think we may hav rats scary little fukkers

but enuff complaints
today shud be fun.... i dnt hav skool. nt a lot of assignments to do. and im gna see the luvd 1 so its all gd

off now!
bwyyyye *waves*

bah humbug....

felt like writing on here 2day.....

had a looooooooooooong day at school 2day...totally glad its over && that i've only got till the 19th 2 go
i swear that skool is tryna kill me...all these feckin deadlines && on top of that they rob me of my measly 30 pounds a week for leaving school an hour early
but ah well...just proves dat i need a job
tried morrisons but they don't want me....a bit of an insult but i'll get over it

am soooo tired....some smart alec keeps ringing me at 3am
i have no clue who he is...his voice sounds nice but jesus why is he calling me at that time?!
4 nights in a row a i might feckin add lol
whoever he is he's broken one of my rules....
and that is unless you are on fire or about to be eaten by a pack of wolves you DO NOT and i mean DO NOT ring me when its sleepy time...
and he has the cheek to ask me to wake maself up
stupid chav....

anyways lifes pretty much off track at the moment but all will be well in the end.....18 daiiz to go

and oh yeah its christmas coming up....a time to eat drink n be merry
i plan 2 spend the whole christmas week drinkin and eating and having as much fun as possible
coz god knows i need it

anyways am gonna go now and do something useful with the rest of my evening
ciao for now!

xXx

remember me?! (i don't)

5th of december was the last time i wrote on here. its now the 28th of april...
well too much has happened in the past 4 && a half months. but hey this ain't jeremy kyle so i aint displayin ma bizness on here

rite now am just listenin 2 music. i have 3 essays to do...but you know what... i don't give two shits... part of me wants to fail.....coz its proves my point that i wasn't ready to do the subject && they should have thrown me off the course months ago

i'm really bored and fed up tbh..... i can't wait till the weekend. i don't care what anyone says to me...i am going out and am gonna dance till i can't stand up. but before that i have a lot of things to sort out and i have a lot of grovelling to do...yes i've been a very stupid gal this weekend but hey i'm 17 its almost compulsery that i do daft things and laugh about it in the morning

well i've nothing really positive or happy to say today, my ipod and 2 fones are knackered, and my man is back in skootland so am totally fuckin peed off
but hey i'm amy mcintosh and the day i stop smilin will be a sad day for us all

so am gonna go now
a'revoir (sp

well welll

i sooo dont use pan.netanymore....i mean weve got facebook and whatnot so its not like i'm gonna check this thing daily...
Been like 4 months since i last wrote...and yeah a lots changed again but i cant b arsed writing shit down
Am reaching the end of my 6 week holidays...its so depressing because i had 3 aims this holiday:
1.)get a job
2.)go visit loverboii in glasgow
3.)have as much fuckin fun as possible
while i've had sum funny times i suppose...i didnt get a job and i didnt go scotland so am totally miffed...bt nevermind i guess
plus i did shit in ma exams but hey at least i passed...dats all dat matters but people stil lfeel sorry 4 me...which is pointless coz at da moment i cudnt give two shits about schoolll

rite now i'm bored just listenin 2 sum r&b trying to think if theres anything i can eat and thinkin about peopllleeee... a fare few of them
those i love...and those ignorant and bitchy mofo's that i know...but fuck them lot they aint gonna put me in a bad mood

think am gonna go grab sum food so bye peoples
mwah
